How it works

1. Register an Account

Sign up and submit your application.

2. Application Review

Our customer care team will contact you for review.

3. Verification Process

We’ll verify your details and update your status.

4. Account Activation

Registration

Exclusive Conditions for AffiliateOrigin Partners

Become a partner of AffiliateOrigin

1. Register a Partner Account

- Sign up, stay active, and upgrade your profile to earn up to 80% commission.

2. Commission on Sales

- Earn a revenue share on all successful sales for long-term passive income.

3. Performance-Based Commission

- Additional commission based on the volume of sales or referrals generated.

4. Weekly Payouts

- Receive stable payouts every week without delays.

5. Affiliate Contests

- Participate for free, earn extra commissions, and win prizes for outstanding performance.

6. Extensive Promotional Materials

- Access a wide range of marketing resources to maximize conversions.

7. Automation with Postbacks

- Simplify tracking and reporting with automated postbacks.

8. 24/7 Support

- Get round-the-clock assistance and advice from our team.

9. Sub-Affiliate Program

- Earn more by building your own affiliate network.

Our plans

Maximize revenue by strategically managing your traffic flow.

Revenue Sharing Plan

- Earn commissions based on the revenue generated by your referrals.

Referral Bonus

- Get a one-time bonus for active referrals, based on their GEO and First-Time Deposit (FTD).

1. Starter Level

1-10 FTDs (First-Time Deposits).

30%

5%

Eligibility:

11-30 FTDs.

40%

4%

Eligibility:

31-100 FTDs.

50%

3.5%

Eligibility:

101-250 FTDs.

60%

Service Fee on Withdrawals:

2.5%

Eligibility:

251-500 FTDs.

70%

Service Fee on Withdrawals:

1.5%

Eligibility:

80%

1%
